game.name: Cloudy with a Chance of Kittens
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Cloudy with a Chance of Kittens is a cozy, Suika-inspired, puzzle game where adorable, dessert-shaped cats fall from the clouds. Unlock power-ups, set up satisfying chains and combos, brave obstacles and cheeky weather twists. Play to relax or compete to leave your pawprint on our leaderboards. üêà
